title: Frying Fish
self_text: Hi Everyone! I just bought a stainless steel skillet and everytime I use it something is always getting stuck on it :( specifically when itâ€™s time to fry something.   I wait until the pan is hot, splash water on it to make sure the water bounces instead of fizzles, add my oil, and then the fish - but when I try to turn the fish the bottom of the fish sticks to the pan. (The temp is on 5 and it begins to fry btw).  What on earth am I doing wrong? :(

title: I'm a part time scientist and have no idea how to cook and I started blog of clueless experimental cooking.
self_text: I min maxed all my points into academia and video games.  When my Gran passed away, I had to learn how to cook, but I don't have a clue, just the scientific method, lets see how the clueless experiments turn out:  https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=q0Dij8DGDjI
